title: pls
body: How can i sign up for PBE?                          {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
You can sign up for PBE access on the EUNE Region [here](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup). Keep in mind you won't be able to do so while maintenance is going on, but after maintenance finishes, you'll be clear to sign up!

Let me know if you have any questions. {{champion:44}}
